name: LibreEHR
tagline: A modern Electronic Health Records system
body: # About LibreEHR is forked from [OpenEMR](https://github.com/openemr/openemr) (an ONC certified open source electronic medical records and practice management application) to create invovation through diversity; we aim to continue the spirit of openness, kindness, and cooperation. Our goal is to take the inspiration of OpenEMR (an open-source, platform-agnostic, application, conceived in 1998) and bring the technologies & application standards up to date, creating a robust alternative to proprietary counterparts. Our objective is to create a truly modular EHR system, utilizing well-designed standalone and 3rd-party components, to aid in the longevity and progress of this project and many physicians offices.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
